directions: In a large bowl, beat eggs.  Mix in beans, sugar, vanilla, melted butter or margarine, and coconut until well blended.   Divide filling into pie crusts.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour, or until done.
ingredients: 1 cup cooked pinto beans with juice
2 (9 inch) deep dish frozen pie crusts, thawed
title: Pinto Bean Pie I
